# MISC::SET_OVERRIDE_WEATHEREX

## Summary
Sets a weather override for network games. This will fix the weather until CLEAR_OVERRIDE_WEATHER is called. ResetWetness=TRUE resets wetness immediately.

## Parameters
* **STRING** weather
* **BOOL** resetWetness

## Description
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
Identical to SET_OVERRIDE_WEATHER but has an additional BOOL param that sets some weather var to 0 if true
